message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.HC 

The paper focuses on large-scale gesture recognition using RGB-D video sequences, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) categories. The paper also discusses the challenges of collecting ground-truth annotations, which is related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper proposes a baseline method using bidirectional long short-term memory (Bi-LSTM), which is a popular technique in multimedia (cs.MM) and human-computer interaction (cs.HC) research.
